title: Trending Nightgeist 6/18: RIP Taco Bell, Jamie Foxx. Beethoven, Raven Symone
itunes:title: Trending Nightgeist 6/18: RIP Taco Bell, Jamie Foxx. Beethoven, Raven Symone
description:
On this edition of the Trending Nightgeist Miles and Laci discuss Taco Bell firing an employee for wearing Black Lives Matter clothing, Jamie Foxx is going to play Mike Tyson in an upcoming biopic, early descriptions of Beethoven suggest he was Black, and Raven Symone is getting married!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
